strapiPost.title: Creating Startup Junkies: Venture Ecosystem Builders Release New Book
strapiPost.content:
Startup Junkie founder Jeff Amerine and Conductor Managing Director Dr. Jeff Standridge are releasing their first co-authored book TODAY.

  • Creating Startup Junkies: Building Sustainable Venture Ecosystems in Unexpected Places will feature the authors' applied knowledge and experience in entrepreneurial ecosystem building. -Startup Junkie
  • The book focuses on the progressive idea of creating sustainable entrepreneurial ecosystems in unexpected places, and serves as a guide to create lasting venture ecosystems for community leaders.
  • Creating Startup Junkies includes a foreword from Congressman French Hill and includes ecosystem building tools and a strategic assessment and synthesis process.
  • Amerine and Standridge will host a virtual book signing today from 1-2pm CT to answer questions. A limited number of copies will be available. Order the book HERE.
